amendatorysection.para: Before recognizing a home state license to practice nursing issued by a state which is a party to the Nurse Licensure Compact, the board shall determine that such state's qualifications for a nursing license are substantially equivalent to or more stringent than the minimum qualifications for issuance of a Nebraska license under the Nurse Practice Act.

crossreference.para: Nurse Licensure Compact, see sections 71-1795 to 71-1795.02.
